DOC.brief_summary: This project seek demonstrate computer kiosk clinic wait room improve access hormonal contraception screen sexually transmit infection . The study randomize control trial evaluate use computer kiosk module compare proportion woman reproductive age receive prescription hormonal contraception computer-assisted provision hormonal contraception offer ( intervention ) encounter study clinic provide standard contraceptive care ( control ) . Subjects contact approximately 3 month ( range 2-4 month ) clinic visit complete follow-up phone interview . The study population include English Spanish-speaking woman age 18-45 seek care clinic . Our hypothesis computer-assisted provision hormonal contraception ( intervention ) increase proportion woman reproductive age receive prescription hormonal contraception versus standard contraceptive care ( control ) .
DOC.criteria: woman speak English Spanish visit study clinic woman speak English Spanish
